snippet: As technology has enlarged the size of video boards in stadiums, players have learned to use them as a rearview mirror to locate their opponents on the field.
abstract: Football players have learned to use ever-sharper and bigger stadium video boards as a kind of rearview mirror to locate their opponents on the field; such was the case during New York Giants receiver Victor Cruz's 74-yard touchdown reception against Dallas Cowboys.
lead_paragraph: As technology has enlarged the size of video boards in stadiums, players have learned to use them as a rearview mirror to locate their opponents on the field.

headline.seo: Stadium Video Screens Offer Football Players a Live Advantage
headline.main: Stadium Video Screens Offer Football Players a Live Advantage
